inlineContent.text: Have you ever been told you’re obsessed? Maybe too much?

My name is Danny Bolella and I’m a Lead iOS Developer for a prominent trading company. For over 7 years I’ve had the pleasure of diving into the world of iOS development, learning about Swift, adopting SwiftUI early on, and embracing the cult-of-Mac whole-heartedly. Over the years, I’ve published a number articles and have review books related to iOS and Swift. This time, I’m hoping to make a new start of it with my own blog.
And what better way to show off my fandom than by writing it in DocC?

abstract.text: Capturing the things on my mind related to iOS, Swift, SwiftUI, and Apple Development. And doing it in DocC.
